Exams.Desc: MGU CAT is a university level entrance exam for candidates seeking admission in various postgraduate programs at MGU. Candidates must have a bachelor's degree with minimum 50% marks from the recognized university.

Exams.Name: AMU BA LLB - ALIGARH MUSLIM UNIVERSITY LAW ENTRANCE EXAMINATION
Exams.Desc: Aligarh Muslim University is a public university in Aligarh

Exams.Name: PU LLB - PANJAB UNIVERSITY LAW ENTRANCE EXAM
Exams.Desc: Punjab University (PU) conducts the entrance examination for admission of eligible candidates into three years LLB Programme

Exams.Name: IUET - INTEGRAL UNIVERSITY ENTRANCE TEST
Exams.Desc: IUET is a state level entrance exam for admission into U.G. and PG. Programmes”. IUET exam is conducted every year by integral University, Lucknow. It is a state level entrance exam for qualifying admission to U.G. and PG. Programmes

Exams.Name: JMI BA LLB - JAMIA MILLIA ISLAMIA BA LLB
Exams.Desc: Jamia Millia Islamia is a Central University located in Jamia Nagar, New Delhi, India. Originally established at Aligarh, United Provinces during the British Raj in 1920, it moved to its current location in Okhla in 1935

Exams.Name: AIBE - ALL INDIA BAR EXAMINATION
Exams.Desc: AIBE, All India Bar Examination, is a national level exam conducted byBar Council of India (BCI) with the objective of assessing the capability of advocates who want to practice law in India.

Exams.Name: AILET - ALL INDIA LAW ENTRANCE TEST
Exams.Desc: All India Law Entrance Test, or AILET, is conducted for admission to law courses in NLUD

Exams.Name: ACLAT - ALLIANCE UNIVERSITY COMMON LAW ADMISSION TEST
Exams.Desc: ACLAT (Alliance University Common Law Admission Test) is conducted by Alliance School of Law for admissions to various undergraduate law courses in the University. The exam is held across 10 exam cities in the country

Jobs: Advocate. Advocacy is one of the chief professions chosen by LLM graduates
Government Services. Students can opt to join Government Services after completing their LLM
